string-array.name: descriptions_english
string-array.item: Characteristics of a barbecue restaurant include: country atmosphere, a selection of different smoked meats typically served with cole slaw or hush puppies, and moderately priced
Characteristics of a breakfast restaurant include: light atmosphere, moderate to highly priced selection of food, food such as: french toast, eggs, bacon, and pancakes.

Characteristics of a buffet restaurant include: A selection of food at a fixed price, food on buffet bars from which guests serve themselves, Modest to extensive selection (might include salad, soup, appetizers, hot entrees, dessert, and fruit)
Characteristics of a chinese restaurant include: strong aroma filled atmosphere, moderately to high priced food selections, food selections consist of sweet, sour, salty, bitter, hot
Characteristics of a cuban restaurant include:
Characteristics of a deli restaurant include:

Characteristics of fast food places include: Focus is primarily on quick service, counter service or drive-thru, usually a chain and serves standardized meals made of processed food, and Casual ambiance
